q: How do I reset my password?
a: Go to Settings > Security and click on 'Reset password'. You will receive an email.
You can reach support via the Help Center chat or by sending an email to support@example.com.

q: Where can I see my billing history?
a: Open the Billing page from your profile menu to see invoices and payment history.
Yes, you can export your data as CSV from the Account > Data Export section.
